bt.peer

Class PeerRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.peer.PeerRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPeerRegistry

    public class PeerRegistry
extends Object
implements IPeerRegistry

    Note that this class implements a service. Hence, is not a part of the public API and is a subject to change.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPeer(TorrentId torrentId, Peer peer)
      Add peer for a given torrent and notify all peer consumers.
      void addPeerSource(TorrentId torrentId, AnnounceKey announceKey)
      Register a new tracker peer source for a given torrent, based on the provided announce key.
      Peer getLocalPeer()
      Returns local peer, that represents current runtime in the swarm.
      void triggerPeerCollection(TorrentId torrentId)
      Trigger a collection of peers for the specified torrent.

    • Method Detail

      • triggerPeerCollection

        public void triggerPeerCollection(TorrentId torrentId)
        Description copied from interface: IPeerRegistry
        Trigger a collection of peers for the specified torrent. Should be called upon starting to download a torrent to improve startup time
        Specified by:
        triggerPeerCollection in interface IPeerRegistry
        Parameters:
        torrentId - the torrent ID to Announce

      • addPeer

        public void addPeer(TorrentId torrentId,
                    Peer peer)
        Description copied from interface: IPeerRegistry
        Add peer for a given torrent and notify all peer consumers.

      • addPeerSource

        public void addPeerSource(TorrentId torrentId,
                          AnnounceKey announceKey)
        Description copied from interface: IPeerRegistry
        Register a new tracker peer source for a given torrent, based on the provided announce key. Note that the new peer source will NOT be used, if the torrent is private (as in BEP-27).
        Specified by:
        addPeerSource in interface IPeerRegistry

      • getLocalPeer

        public Peer getLocalPeer()
        Description copied from interface: IPeerRegistry
        Returns local peer, that represents current runtime in the swarm.
        Specified by:
        getLocalPeer in interface IPeerRegistry
        Returns:
        Local peer
